pages.text: Monster ingredients are dropped from mobs. All of the monster ingredients have 1.0 monster value.$(br)If two or more monster ingredients are used in the pot, the crock pot produces $(item)Monster Lasagna$() unless $(item)Stick$() or $(item)Bamboo$() are added (which makes $(item)Wet Goop$()) or higher priority food is available. As such, only one monster ingredient should ever be attempted as filler for a dish.
$(l)The following are monster ingredients()$(br)$(item)Rotten Flesh$(), $(item)Spider Eye$(), $(br)$(item)Phantom Membrane$(), $(item)Pufferfish$()
